ma wenuwen me ahinsaka kurullo siyayaka ge jiwitha winasha karanawata wada ma miyayama mata sapathak.thama birindage me dadi wirodhaya nisa dan kalayuththe kumakdayi kiya therum berum karagatha nohaki awinishchitha swabhawayakata fan mahatha pathwa sitiye ya.nihandiyawa bindimin fan mahathmiya wegawath swarayen nawatha swamiya amathuwaya.
ese karannata bari ya, owhu ma awuth apa pitathata gena yathwa”yi ki ya. 38 polis sewakayo epawath nadukarayanta sala kalaha.

11.45ta thawa sulu welawak ithiriwa thibu nisa haki ikmanin laka lasthi wi kita samagin patuwatha hostal ekata ( patuwatha - moratu wishwawidyalaye pirimi newasikagarayak) diwa giyemu.awurudu ganak yannata uthsahayen siti gamanak sabawata pathwemin thibe.patuwathin apa samanga ekathu wana sagaya wuye kaba ayiyayi.wenada nam welawatath kalin ohu durakathana amathumak nowaradawama labe.ada welawath pasuwi ohugen amathumak natha.me gamana awurudu gananak bala sita pitathwannata onna menna thiyeddith ohugen kisidu prathicharayak natha."kellek hambunama kollo wenas wenne na kiyanawa nam kanata dekak gahala payin ekkuth gahala kaba pennapan."e kiyanne punkat ayiyayi.habawaki ada amathumak natha eekath kamak natha ohu parakkuya.ohu ee ganu lamaya ha hada wi sathi dekak wath ikma gos natha.kamak natha rumata gos ohuda kadawagena api thunkattuwa.kolambaa kotuwa bala giyemu ethanadi apata ekathuwana thawath gaman sangayek siti ohu namin tana ya nathahoth tana ayiyaya..12.30ta pamana kotuwata langa wu apage iranama ithamath shoka janaka wiya.karumaya yanu apa pitathwa yamata sudanam wu bas rathaya idaganimata kese wethath hitagena yamatawath idak nomatha.sitibi sihinaya athahara prayiwat bas soyagena ee desata giyath me yakku gas nagina aluyama apata senanga nomathi bas rathayak soyaganimata nohaki wiya.nawatha sitibi bas rathaya desata yana wita tana ayiya ethanata pamina sitiye aluth bag ekkuth karalagenaya.thawamath apage gaman sagayan sampurna natha , thawath ek sagayaku kandayama sampurna kirimata awasiya ohu namin rana ayiyaya.ohu gamanata ekathu wanne awissawelediya.eelanga bas rathaya pitath wanne udasana 5.30taya apata ethek bas stand ekata wisitiya haka namuda gamana pama kala nohaka.minisun dethundenakuge kakul paga amaruwen apa hathara dena basaya thulata badaga gathemu.

panthiyen eliye thibune maha wisala mara gahak.habayi panthiya athule rasneyi.tika welawakin baladdi menna mamra aathal eke hulan wadi wadi mara gaha yata innawalu.mamrata gemak dipu un tika panthiya athule thambenawalu.tika welawakin thamayi kollo set ekata ganadewi nuwana pahala wune.eka paratama panthiya athule hena gosawak athiwuna.kollo ka gahanawalu,rokat yawanawalu, eka eka wikara karanawalu.sartath ithin mara mala.kohoma hari paya kalak yaddi kassa pasan, nadan wage adhyapana dayal tikak arenna mulu panthiyama ara mara gaha yatalu.oya wade dawas deka thunak weddi ara demala sartath 9 -
